directions: Place the zucchini, and squash on a large sheet of aluminum foil, and dot with butter. Season with salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Seal vegetables in the foil.
Place the foil pack on the preheated grill, and cook 20 minutes, until vegetables are tender.
ingredients: 2 zucchini, halved lengthwise and cut in 1/4 inch slices
title: Grilled Zucchini and Squash
